comment:
When the label says "distilled from cane and grain", you know its pretty basic..but.
The thing is, this has a corny nose and a corny taste but finishes smooth. There is just something about this I like, it wont "WOW" you but doesn't dissapoint. Tried it's competition,  Old Smokey....much perfer the taste of this. First found it at the distillery in Gatlinburg, has been a favorite shine since.
